column3: HIV infection in combination with atleast two other antiretroviral drugs.
column4: Fever,Rash,Nausea,Vomiting,Diarrhoea,Stomach pain,General ill feeling,Extreme tiredness,Body aches,Shortness of breath,Cough,Sore throat

Bleeding manifestations,Nausea,Vomiting,Hypotension,Bradycardia,Chest pain,Back pain,Headache,Fever,Puncture site pain,Thrombocytopenia,Cardiac tamponade,Adult respiratory distress,Hypersensitivity reactions

Flatulence,Soft stools,Diarrhoea (may need to reduce dose or withdraw),Abdominal distention,Pain,Rarely, nausea,Abnormal liver function tests and skin reactions,Very rarely ileus,Oedema,Jaundice, and hepatitis
